column1: When an exercise is scheduled always prioritize the meals around the exercise pre/post window and fill in the remaining meals and snacks around this within the time restrictions for breakfast and dinner
Pre-Meals open up 4 hours before, and is offered when 2.5-4 hours of pre meal time is available
At less than 2.5 Hours they change lower quantity pre meal which stays open until pre-snack is triggered
Pre Snack opens up 1 hour before and closes 15 mins before
Post Snack remains open straight after exercise until Post Meal is trigered
Post Meal is open 2.5 hours post exercise
Additional snacks to fill up calories/macros should be after dinner always. If no dinner add with final Post-Snack
If practices are 7+ hours difference in time apart, do post meal straight after, pre meal and pre snack
If practices are within 4-7 hours apart, follow general time trends
If practices are within 3 to 4 hours, offer pre meal straight after and pre snack
If practices are within 2-3 hours, offer Post Snack and Pre Snack only
If Practices are less than 2 hours apart off Post Snack until 30 mins before
Breakfast should never be before 7am. Follow General Meal Time rules above as much as possible
On days where nothing scheduled, follow 9am, Snack, 1pm, Snack, Dinner
Only start using the rules of adjusting calories and macros for the pre and post exercise meals.
For any meals outside this range don't change their calorie and macro content by time to exercise; always have them be 3 hours pre or post the last exercise meal and cut off after 1.5 hours
